name: LN_TEST_DT_QUAL
description:
This table holds qualifiers that describe the test dates. 





The LN_TEST_DT_QUAL and LN_TEST_DT tables are related to one another.  The number of lines in these tables will always be the same and values on the same line in each table will correspond to one another.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this contact.

columns.name: LN_TEST_DT_QUAL
columns.description: This item holds a code indicating the type of test date reported.
